parameters.name: IncludeTags
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the tag information. Valid values:

*   Enabled
*   Disabled (default)

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.\
Pages start from page 1.\
Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.\
Valid values: 1 to 50.\
Default value: 10.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group.\
For more information about resource groups, see the "Resource Group" section of [What is Resource Management?](~~94475~~)

parameters.name: ShareType
parameters.description:
The sharing type of the template.

Valid values:

*   Private (default): The template belongs to the template owner.
*   Shared: The template is shared with other users.
*   Official: The template is the shared template of the official version.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags. You can specify up to 20 tags.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The template name. This parameter takes effect only when ShareType is set to Private. The name can be up to 255 characters in length, and can contain digits, letters, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). The name must start with a digit or letter.
